link.title: Mana Academy | United States | Mana Academy Charter School

meta.name: description
meta.content: Mana Academy is an accredited non-profit public charter school in West Valley City, Utah. Founded in 2013, Mana Academy is a community created school with a focus on cultural-based education and developing life-long learners by providing our students from diverse ethnic and cultural backgrounds a sense of belonging.
Mana Academy | United States | Mana Academy Charter School

Mana Academy is an accredited non-profit public charter school in West Valley City, Utah. Founded in 2013, Mana Academy is a community created school with a focus on cultural-based education and developing life-long learners by providing our students from diverse ethnic and cultural backgrounds a sense of belonging.
